# Preface {-}

These are the class notes for the Winter 2022 section of cmsc/stat 205: Data-Scientific Programming at Lawrence University. In addition to these notes, you will find helpful examples in our primary course text [R for Data Science by Wickham and Grolemund](https://r4ds.had.co.nz/) and our secondary text [Modern Data Science with R by Baumer, Kaplan, and Horton](https://mdsr-book.github.io/mdsr2e/).
